attributes.action: Ensure the current disgraced MPs step down now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure that the disgraced MPs of all parties step down now instead of waiting for the General Election. They are continuing to 'milk' the system by waiting until the General Election because by waiting to do it at the General Election they get lucrative 'pay offs' £30,000-£40,000 of which is Tax Exempt.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
